dict.acceptation: 生而为人；人格，人品，个性；人物；名人；

sent.orig: As the personality to step aside so that you can hear clear guidance.
sent.trans: 当人格(personality)走开，你可以清晰听到引导。

sent.orig: The study says almost 18% of college students appeared to have a personality personality disorder.
sent.trans: 研究表明差不多18％的大学生表现出性格紊乱。

sent.orig: Teachers' personality plays an important part ev olpment of students' personality.
sent.trans: 教师人格对学生人格的发展具有重要作用。

sent.orig: Owing to market economy, abnormality of personality and handicap personality is arisen.
sent.trans: 由于市场经济改革，人格出现了失范，产生了障碍人格，因此，必须构建现代人格。

sent.orig: A comparative psychological approach on personality actually refers to animal personality research.
sent.trans: 个性的比较心理学研究，实质上是指动物个性研究。
